select -- 레스토랑 기본 정보 pr.id, pr.name, pr.lat, pr.lon, pr.category_id from p_restaurants as pr left outer join p_restaurant_facilities prf on pr.id = prf.restaurant_id
and prf.baby_bed = true and prf.baby_chair = true and prf.baby_menu = true and prf.baby_tableware = true and prf.stroller = true and prf.diaper_change = true and prf.meeting_room = true and prf.nursing_room = true and prf.play_room = true and prf.parking = true ST_DistanceSphere(geom, ST_MakePoint(#{lon},#{lat})) <= 500

-- 레스토랑,카페 상세보기 select -- 레스토랑 기본 정보 pr.id, pr.name, pr.address, pr.phone, -- 레스토랑 유아 관련 정보 prf.baby_bed,prf.baby_chair,prf.baby_menu,prf.baby_tableware,prf.stroller,prf.diaper_change,prf.meeting_room,prf.nursing_room,prf.play_room,prf.parking, -- 레스토랑 이미지 ( N ) pri.id, pri.image_path, -- 레스토랑 매뉴 ( N ) prm.name as menuName, prm.price, -- 레스토랑 정보, prif.start_time, prif.end_time, prif.close_day, prif.memo, -- 리뷰 토탈 ROUND((select avg(total_rating) from p_restaurant_reviews where restaurant_id= pr.id ),1) as review_total, -- 북마크 상태 (select case when count(id) > 0 then true else false end from p_restaurant_bookmarks prb where user_id = #{userId} and id = #{id} ) as is_bookmarked from p_restaurants as pr left outer join p_restaurant_facilities prf on pr.id = prf.restaurant_id left outer join p_restaurant_images pri on pr.id = pri.restaurant_id left outer join p_restaurant_menu prm on pr.id = prm.restaurant_id left outer join p_restaurant_info prif on pr.id = prif.restaurant_id where pr.id = #{id};
